channel.title: Portal issue

item.title: Portal issue
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

I want it so they need 99 attack to enter this portal. here is the error i got

here is the code someone gave me.

case 4408: // attackportal if(playerLevel[0] >= 99) { teleportToX = 3087; teleportToY = 3511; sendMessage("99 Attack Guild"); break;

Whats the problem? [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2008, 08:01:31 PM[/size][hr]bump

Read full topic
